pages.text: 95|1|a l laoh sbath nung phle ti n( phle lvea) ning hsaai toun ( phle au liv) .
95|2|ning phnom tour sai na .
95|3|ning tikrong nih( mea kkah) del brakabdaoy sokh sa ndi pheap .
95|4|chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa lok sthet knong  trongtreay muoy da la brasaer bamphot .
95|5|banteabmk yeung ban banhchoun puokke tralb towkean kanleng  del teab cheangke bamphot( bat nork) .
95|6|leuklengte banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeu  la troemotrauv  ku puokke nung ttuol ban phalbony chea ni r nd  .
95|7|dau che  neah  banteabpi nih tow  tae ei  v del thveu aoy anak( mnoussa lok)  bdeseth nung thngai chomnoumchomreah( thngai barlok) noh
95|8|tae a l laoh minmen chea anak katsechakdei da brasaer bamphot  cheang anak katsechakdei teanglay te ryy
96|1|chaur anak( mou ham meat) sautr knongnam mcheasa robsa anak del ban  bangkeut( nouv avei  teangoasa) choh .
96|2|trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok pi kam am n k chheam muoy dom .
96|3|chaur anak sautr choh  haey mcheasa robsa anak mha sabborsa
96|4|del trong ban bangrien( kar sarser) daoy slab ba ka .
96|5|trong ban bangrien mnoussa lok nouv avei delke minban doeng .
96|6|te.  karpit mnoussa lok ku pitchea bampean( leu chbab robsa  a l laoh)
96|7|daoysaar ke ylkheunh tha  khuo  l n ke mean krobkrean haey .
96|8|pitabrakd nasa  kanleng vilotralb  ku chhpaoh towkean mcheasa  robsa anak .
96|9|tae anak( mou ham meat) bankheunh anak del( a pou cha ha l)  hamkhat
96|10|khnhom robsa a l laoh( mou ham meat) nowpel delke sa lat  te ryy
96|11|tae anak ylkheunh yeang dauch me  dch  brasenbae ke( khnhom robsa  a l laoh) sthetnow leu meakra da troemotrauv
96|12|ryy ke ban brae knea aoy kaotakhlach a l laoh noh
96|13|tae anak( mou ham meat) ylkheunh yeang dauch me  d ch der brasen  bae ke( a pou cha ha l) ban bdeseth ning berchenh( pi chomnue) noh
96|14|tae ke( a pou cha ha l) mindoeng te ryytha  a l laoh pitchea kheunh( tongveu robsa ke) noh
96|15|phtoytowvinh.  brasenbae ke minochhb bampean te noh yeung  nung chab kbal robsa ke rounh tomleak tow knong nork cheaminkhan  .
96|16|ku kbal anak del phout kohk  ning sang babakamm .
96|17|dau che  neah  chaur anak aoy ke srekhaw krom robsa ke mk chuoy choh
96|18|yeung nung haw anakyeam nork( daembi chab ke baoh tomleak  tow knong nork) .
96|19|pho  t y towvinh  chaur anak( mou ham meat) kom thveuteam ke aoy saoh  haey chaur anak saou chout  ning banhchit khluon tow champoh trong choh .
